I need a soda with me at all times.

participant_2.background:
I hit for over forty million dollars.
I used to work a 9 5 job as a telemarketer.
One day i played the lottery.
I will never punch a clock again.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for work?
I'm a retired millionaire. I used to be a telemarketer, but then I won the lottery.
Wow, that's amazing! What did you do with all the money?
I bought a house, a car, and a boat. I also invested some of it.
That's great! I'm sure you're enjoying your retirement.
I am! I have a lot more time to do the things I love, like spending time with my family and friends.
That's great! What do you like to do with your family?
We like to go on vacations, go to the movies, and just hang out.
That sounds like fun! I'm glad you're enjoying your retirement.
Thanks!
What was your favorite thing about working as a telemarketer?
I liked being able to talk to people and help them solve their problems.
That's a good quality to have as a telemarketer.
I think it is too. I'm glad I was able to help people.
What was your least favorite thing about working as a telemarketer?
I didn't like the pressure to sell things. I felt like I was always being pressured to make a sale, even if the person didn't need the product.
That's understandable. I'm sure it can be a lot of pressure.
It was. But it was also a good experience. I learned a lot about myself and how to deal with pressure.
That's great! I'm glad you were able to find a positive experience in your job.
Me too. It was a good learning experience.
